page.title: 18CLUBS AND CHARITIES
page.content:
These clubs regularly use Knowl Hill Village Hall. {Brownies Guides {Cubs Scouts { {Mother and Toddler Club {Sunday Club}(a Sunday School) {Friendship Club }(this is for the elderly people of the area who enjoy a chat, a cup of tea and a game of Bingo.) The {Womens Institute }meets once a month.
{Yeldall Manor}has been run by a Christian Charity,"Operation Concern", since the {1970s}as a rehabilitation centre for drug addicts. The Manor was built about{ 1874} as a Gentleman's residence. Some time this Century it became a Convent,then in{1960}it was the base for a Christian Community.
